name: scribe-css-build
description: Build tools for Scribe ESP32-C3 Thermal Printer CSS

scripts.build-js: npx terser src/js/fetch_helpers.js src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js src/js/messaging.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js --source-map && npx terser src/js/index.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/index.min.js --source-map && npx terser src/js/diagnostics.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/diagnostics.min.js --source-map && npx terser src/js/settings-api.js src/js/settings-ui.js src/js/settings-led.js src/js/settings-main.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/settings.min.js --source-map
scripts.build-js-prod: npx terser src/js/fetch_helpers.js src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js src/js/messaging.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js && npx terser src/js/index.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/index.min.js && npx terser src/js/diagnostics.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/diagnostics.min.js && npx terser src/js/settings-api.js src/js/settings-ui.js src/js/settings-led.js src/js/settings-main.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/settings.min.js
scripts.build-js-main: npx terser src/js/fetch_helpers.js src/js/config.js src/js/shared.js src/js/messaging.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/app.min.js --source-map
scripts.build-js-settings: npx terser src/js/settings-api.js src/js/settings-ui.js src/js/settings-led.js src/js/settings-main.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/settings.min.js --source-map
scripts.build-js-settings-combined: npx terser src/js/settings-api.js src/js/settings-ui.js src/js/settings-led.js src/js/settings-main.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/settings.min.js --source-map
scripts.build-js-settings-alpine: cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js data/js/alpine.min.js && npx terser src/js/settings-alpine-store.js src/js/settings-api.js --compress --mangle --output data/js/settings-alpine.min.js --source-map
scripts.build-js-alpine-all: cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js data/js/alpine.min.js && npm run build-js-settings-alpine && npm run build-js-index-alpine && npm run build-js-diagnostics-alpine && npm run build-js-404-alpine
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-css-prod && npm run build-js-prod
